name: Super Accelerator
description:
Super Accelerator

The game is made, unofficially, as part of the game jam 'Ludum Dare 47'.

The theme was 'stuck in a loop', which lead to the creation of a game inspired by particle accelerators. Typically modern particle accelerators are big circular rings, though in this game, the accelerators that you build and configure are bended pipes.

If you are ready for some mind-twisting particle-physics-puzzles, then you have come to the right place.
